languages.text: "Служба в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g} — испытание, живым из которого выходят очень немногие. Подняться в иерархии Имперской гвардии, стать командиром армии — свидетельство твоей прозорливости не только на поле боя, но и в хитросплетениях офицерских интриг. Поверь, окружение Вольного Торговца даст тебе немало шансов проявить и свои дипломатические навыки, и боевую подготовку".

traits.locale_text: "Служба в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g} — испытание, живым из которого выходят очень немногие. Подняться в иерархии Имперской гвардии, стать командиром армии — свидетельство твоей прозорливости не только на поле боя, но и в хитросплетениях офицерских интриг. Поверь, окружение Вольного Торговца даст тебе немало шансов проявить и свои дипломатические навыки, и боевую подготовку".

languages.text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."
languages.original_text: "Служба в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g} — испытание, живым из которого выходят очень немногие. Подняться в иерархии Имперской гвардии, стать командиром армии — свидетельство твоей прозорливости не только на поле боя, но и в хитросплетениях офицерских интриг. Поверь, окружение Вольного Торговца даст тебе немало шансов проявить и свои дипломатические навыки, и боевую подготовку".

traits.locale_text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangles of officers' intrigues. I assure you, the company that any Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

"Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangles of officers' intrigues. I assure you, the company that any Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

"Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

"Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}的服役非常考验人，极少有人能从中脱颖而出。你能在帝国卫队中获得升迁，担任军队的指挥官，这足以证明你无论是在战场上，还是在军官阴谋的纠葛之中，都有着相当精明的头脑。我可以向你保证，身为行商浪人的随行人员，你会有很多机会展示你的外交手腕与战斗技巧。”
languages.original_text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}的服役非常考验人，极少有人能从中脱颖而出。你能在帝国卫队中获得升迁，担任军队的指挥官，这足以证明你无论是在战场上，还是在军官阴谋的纠葛之中，都有着相当精明的头脑。我可以向你保证，身为行商浪人的随行人员，你会有很多机会展示你的外交手腕与战斗技巧。”

languages.text: «El servicio en el {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} es una prueba de la que muy pocos salen con vida. El que hayas ascendido por el escalafón de la Guardia Imperial hasta dirigir un ejército es prueba de tu astucia, tanto en el campo de batalla como en la compleja red de intrigas oficiales. Te aseguro que la compañía que tiene cualquier Comerciante Independiente te dará ocasiones de sobra de demostrar tus habilidades, tanto en combate como en diplomacia».
languages.original_text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

traits.locale_text: «El servicio en el {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} es una prueba de la que muy pocos salen con vida. El que hayas ascendido por el escalafón de la Guardia Imperial hasta dirigir un ejército es prueba de tu astucia, tanto en el campo de batalla como en la compleja red de intrigas oficiales. Te aseguro que la compañía que tiene cualquier Comerciante Independiente te dará ocasiones de sobra de demostrar tus habilidades, tanto en combate como en diplomacia».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}での奉仕は、生還できる者が極めて少ない試練だ。帝国防衛軍の階級をのし上がって軍の指揮に就任したということは、戦場でも、将校の陰謀の絡み合った人間関係の中でも洞察力があることの証だ。保証しよう。自由開拓者が身近に置いておく仲間は、あなたの外交手腕と戦闘能力の両方を証明する多くの機会を提供してくれるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}での奉仕は、生還できる者が極めて少ない試練です。帝国防衛軍の階級をのし上がって軍の指揮に就任したということは、戦場でも、将校の陰謀の絡み合った人間関係の中でも洞察力があることの証です。保証してもいい。ローグトレーダーが身近に置いておく仲間は、あなたの外交手腕と戦闘能力の両方を証明する多くの機会を提供してくれるでしょう」
「{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}での奉仕は、生還できる者が極めて少ない試練だ。帝国防衛軍の階級をのし上がって軍の指揮に就任したということは、戦場でも、将校の陰謀の絡み合った人間関係の中でも洞察力があることの証だ。保証しよう。自由開拓者が身近に置いておく仲間は、あなたの外交手腕と戦闘能力の両方を証明する多くの機会を提供してくれるでしょう」

languages.text: « Le service au sein de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} est une épreuve dont très peu de personnes ressortent en vie. Le fait que vous avez gravi les échelons de la Garde Impériale et pris le commandement d'une armée témoigne de votre perspicacité, tant sur le champ de bataille que dans la toile des intrigues d'officiers. Je peux vous assurer que les relations qu'entretient {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} vous offriront de nombreuses occasions de démontrer à la fois vos talents de diplomate et vos prouesses martiales. »
languages.original_text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

traits.locale_text: « Le service au sein de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} est une épreuve dont très peu de personnes ressortent en vie. Le fait que vous avez gravi les échelons de la Garde Impériale et pris le commandement d'une armée témoigne de votre perspicacité, tant sur le champ de bataille que dans la toile des intrigues d'officiers. Je peux vous assurer que les relations qu'entretient {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} vous offriront de nombreuses occasions de démontrer à la fois vos talents de diplomate et vos prouesses martiales. »

languages.text: "Der Dienst im {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} ist eine Prüfung, die nur wenige lebend überstehen. Dass Ihr in den Reihen der imperialen Armee bis in den Kommandantenrang aufgestiegen seid, zeugt von Eurem Scharfsinn, sowohl auf dem Schlachtfeld als auch in dem verwobenen Netz der Offiziersintrigen. Ich versichere Euch, im Umfeld eines Freihändlers gibt es reichlich Gelegenheit, Euch sowohl auf diplomatischem Parkett als auch im Kampf zu beweisen."
languages.original_text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."

Dass Ihr in den Reihen der imperialen Armee bis in den Kommandantenrang aufgestiegen seid, zeugt von Eurem Scharfsinn, sowohl auf dem Schlachtfeld als auch in dem verwobenen Netz der Offiziersintrigen. languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum'da{/g} hizmet, pek azının sağ salim çıkabildiği bir sınavdır. İmparatorluk Muhafızları saflarında yükselerek bir ordunun komutasına atanmış olman dirayetinin kanıtı... Hem savaş meydanında hem de çetrefilli subay entrikası ağında. Emin ol ki, Hür Tacir'in kurduğu bağlantılar sana hem diplomatik becerilerini hem de savaştaki hünerini sergilemen için pek çok fırsat sunacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g} is a trial from which very few people emerge with their life. That you have risen through the ranks of the Imperial Guard and assumed command of an army is a testament to your astuteness, both on the battlefield and in the tangled net of officer intrigues. I assure you, the company that a Rogue Trader keeps will offer you plenty of chances to demonstrate both your diplomatic skills and your combat prowess."
